title: Borderlands Movie Nabs Eli Roth - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.20.20
description:
Get started with your first month free by going to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily.

If you go to http://getquip.com/games right now, you’ll get your first refill free!

Eli Roth is directing the Borderlands movie, we love what we saw of Animal Crossing, and Fortnite's back!

Time Stamps - 
00:04:45 - Housekeeping
Knights and Bikes Giveaway!
HELO!
Shout-Out to Attack Peter: Skybound
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis, Frankfurter, Drew Gardiner, Katie Gallacher, David Meintel, BLACK JACK, Dominic Shorter, Mohammed Mohammed, Patrick Higgins, Ginny Berndt, The Nano Biologist, Travis
The Roper Report   -
00:10:37 -  Eli Roth’s Directing the Borderlands Movie? Chris Priestman @ PCGamer
00:25:55 -  Fortnite Chapter 2 Season 2 Launches, Riley MacLeod Kotaku
00:32:40 -  Animal Crossing: New Horizons Direct
00:38:32 - Does the lack of cloud save support for Animal Crossing make you nervous? - Best Friends Q: 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:43:11 - CD Projeckt Red Making more off Witcher 3 on Steam now…
00:48:23 - Private Division Opens Kerbal Space Program Studio
00:51:55 -  HIMS
00:53:22 - QUIP
00:54:17 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
01:00:52 - Could you see WB Games splitting up the Batman brands with tied developer? - Jason Das
01:05:45 - Squad Up: SilverLobo(PC Uplay) SilverLobo21x
01:06:42 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Tim
